projects.title: Death Star
projects.description: Ultimate battle station capable of destroying entire planets
projects.content:
# Death Star

The Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

## Features
- Planet-destroying superlaser
- Advanced defense systems
- Massive troop capacity
- Complete mobile command center

projects.title: TIE Fighter Program
projects.description: Mass production of advanced Imperial starfighters
projects.content:
# TIE Fighter Program

Standardized Imperial starfighter production.

## Features
- Twin ion engines
- Solar panel wings
- Advanced targeting systems
- Mass production capabilities

projects.title: Order 66
projects.description: Systematic elimination of the Jedi Order
projects.content:
# Order 66

Coordinated operation to eliminate the Jedi Order.

## Features
- Clone trooper programming
- Synchronized execution
- Galaxy-wide implementation
- Complete Jedi database
